newsitem.title: USA: Sterling Commerce to buy Automated Catalogue.
newsitem.headline: Sterling Commerce to buy Automated Catalogue.

text.p: Sterling Commerce Inc said Thursday it entered into a letter of intent to acquire privately held Automated Catalogue Services Lp for undisclosed terms.

Automated Catalogue, located in Wayne, Pa., creates and publishes business-related product information databases delivered via CD-ROM and over the Internet, and creates customized electronic catalogues for manufacturers and distributors.
Sterling said the acquisition will complement the Internet and World Wide Web-related electronic commerce products and services provided by Sterling Commerce's Commerce Services Group.
The acquisition is expected to close by mid-May, sterling said.
